description: AMD GPU Metrics based on the prometheus metrics from github.com/utkuozdemir/nvidia_gpu_exporter

panels.description: The official product name of the GPU. This is an alphanumeric string. For all products.
panels.title: Name

panels.description: The current performance state for the GPU. States range from auto, low, high or manual.
panels.title: P-State

panels.description: Core GPU temperature. in degrees C.
panels.title: GPU Temperature

panels.description: Core GPU temperature. in degrees C.
panels.title: GPU Temperature

panels.description: The version of the installed AMD display driver. This is an alphanumeric string.
panels.title: Driver Version

panels.description: The BIOS of the GPU board.
panels.title: Vbios Version

panels.description: Total memory allocated by active contexts.
panels.title: Memory Allocation

panels.description:
Percent of time over the past sample period during which global (device) memory was being read or written.
The sample period may be between 1 second and 1/6 second depending on the product.
panels.title: GPU Memory Utilization %

panels.description:
Percent of time over the past sample period during which global (device) memory was being read or written.
The sample period may be between 1 second and 1/6 second depending on the product.
panels.title: GPU Memory Utilization %

panels.description:
Percent of time over the past sample period during which one or more kernels was executing on the GPU.
The sample period may be between 1 second and 1/6 second depending on the product.
panels.title: GPU Utilization %

panels.description:
Percent of time over the past sample period during which one or more kernels was executing on the GPU.
The sample period may be between 1 second and 1/6 second depending on the product.
panels.title: GPU Utilization %

panels.description: The fan speed value is the percent of the product's maximum noise tolerance fan speed that the device's fan is currently intended to run at. This value may exceed 100% in certain cases. Note: The reported speed is the intended fan speed. If the fan is physically blocked and unable to spin, this output will not match the actual fan speed. Many parts do not report fan speeds because they rely on cooling via fans in the surrounding enclosure.
panels.title: GPU Fan Speed %

panels.description: The fan speed value is the percent of the product's maximum noise tolerance fan speed that the device's fan is currently intended to run at. This value may exceed 100% in certain cases. Note: The reported speed is the intended fan speed. If the fan is physically blocked and unable to spin, this output will not match the actual fan speed. Many parts do not report fan speeds because they rely on cooling via fans in the surrounding enclosure.
panels.title: GPU Fan Speed %

panels.description: The last measured power draw for the entire board, in watts. Only available if power management is supported. This reading is accurate to within +/- 5 watts / The software power limit in watts.
panels.title: GPU Power Draw %

panels.description: The last measured power draw for the entire board, in watts. Only available if power management is supported. This reading is accurate to within +/- 5 watts
panels.title: Power Draw

title: AMD GPU Metrics
